text: nkunnyuwa ahumye dibaluwa dya kummaiha Sauli n'ding'ande dya kunnyuwila Nnungu dya ku Dameski, uchinga akankoja munu woheyo wa nnikuwa lya vanu vankulupîla Yesu lichêmwa, “Indila Aila,”9:2 “Indila aila,” aneyo yávele namuna ya kuvatambuliha vanu vachimpapata Yesu. akàva nnume au mmahe ankamule na kumpelekeja ku Yelusalemu.
